Interacting Gene/Enzyme: HLA class II histocompatibility antigen, DQ alpha 1 chain
Description: The presence of this polymorphism in TNXB may indicate an increased risk of drug-induced ALT-elevations leading to hepatotoxicity when treated with lapatinib.

Description: The presence of this polymorphism in TNXB may indicate an increased risk of drug-induced ALT-elevations leading to hepatotoxicity when treated with lapatinib.
